name: Alan Partridge I - Partridge Watch
description:
# Backstory To celebrate today's launch of my Hero's new book: `Alan Partridge: Nomad`, We have a new series of kata arranged around the great man himself. # Task Given an array of terms, if any of those terms relate to Alan Partridge, return `Mine's a Pint!` The number of exclamation mark (`!`) after the `t` should be determined by the number of Alan related terms you find in the given array (`x`). The related terms are as follows: ``` Partridge PearTree Chat Dan Toblerone Lynn AlphaPapa Nomad ``` If you don't find any related terms, return `Lynn, I've pierced my foot on a spike!!` # Other katas in this series: Alan Partridge II - Apple Turnover
Alan Partridge III - London
